Package starvationevasion.common.gamecards

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameCard
    GameCard is the structure used by the Client, Server and Simulator.
    Policy_CleanRiverIncentive
    Title: "Clean River Incentive"

    Game Text: "X% tax break for farmers in my region who reduce by 20% the outflow of pesticides and fertilizers from their farms into the rivers."

    Flavor Text: "We should do something before the city council realizes that the \'Kool-Aid\' actually came straight out of the tap."

    Draft Affects: When drafting this policy, player selects a percentage X [5%, 10%, or 25%].

    Votes Required: Automatic

    Model Effects: The sim estimates the number and location of farms within the region and the amount spent by those farms on improved irrigation.
    Policy_CovertIntelligence
    Title: "Covert Intelligence"

    Game Text: "You get to covertly examine target player\'s hand and the top seven cards of that player\'s deck. You may target yourself. During the voting phase, other players will see that you have played this card, but not know its target."

    Flavor Text: "\'Spy\' is such a short ugly word. I prefer \'espionage.\' Those extra three syllables really say something."
    "-Howard Tayler, Emperor Pius Dei"

    Votes Required: Automatic

    Model Effects: The fact that such cards as this exist, implies the draw pile must be set at the start of the game rather than cards being randomly picked at draw time.
    Policy_DivertFunds
    Title: "Divert Funds"

    Game Text: "Discard your current hand. Gain $14 million."

    Flavor Text: "No one can come up with a good idea. Good thing we\'re paid anyways."

    Votes Required: Automatic
    Policy_EducateTheWomenCampaign
    Title: "Educate the Women Campaign"

    Game Text: "The US sends a total of $70 million to educate woman of the target world region including reading, basic business and farming techniques."

    Draft Affects: When drafting this policy, player selects target world region and X million dollars.

    Votes Required: 4

    Model Effects: model needs four control points of each ease-in-out cubic Bezier function giving investment verses food trade penalty function reduction.
    Policy_EfficientIrrigationIncentive
    Title: "Efficient Irrigation Incentive"

    Game Text: "From now through the start of the next turn, X% of money spent by farmers in player\'s region for improved irrigation efficiency is tax deductible."

    Flavor Text: "Maybe this\'ll get them to stop using lawn sprinklers for watering 100 acres of soy."

    Draft Affects: When drafting this policy, player selects a percentage X [10%, 25%, or 50%].

    Votes Required: Automatic

    Model Effects: The sim estimates the number and location of farms within the region and the amount spent by those farms on improved irrigation.
    Policy_EthanolTaxCreditChange
    Title: "Ethanol Production Tax Credit Change"

    Game Text: "This policy changes an ethanol producer, located in my region, to have an X% tax credit to cost of ethanol production, including cellulosic ethanol."

    Flavor Text: "Any ideas on how to fit \'Honk if you\'re carbon-neutral\' on a license plate?"

    Votes Required: Automatic

    Draft Affects: When drafting this policy, the model must inform the player of their current tax credit of ethanol production and require the player selects X.

    Model Effects:

    Policy_FarmInfrastructureSubSaharan  
    Policy_FertilizerAidCentralAsia  
    Policy_FertilizerAidMiddleAmerica  
    Policy_FertilizerAidOceania
    Title: "Fertilizer Aid to Oceania"

    Game Text: "Each region of the United States sends X million dollars in fertilizer to Oceania."

    Draft Affects: When drafting this policy, player selects X million dollars.

    Votes Required: Automatic

    Model Effects: model needs four control points of each ease-in-out cubic Bezier function giving investment verses food trade penalty function reduction.
    Policy_FertilizerAidSouthAsia  
    Policy_FertilizerAidSubSaharan  
    Policy_FertilizerSubsidy
    Title: "Fertilizer or Feed Subsidy"

    Game Text: "This policy offers a subsidy of 20% rebate to farmers in your region purchasing commercial fertilizer or feed supplements for target crop or live stock."

    Draft Affects: When drafting this policy, player selects target food product.

    Votes Required: Automatic

    Model Effects: This policy makes conventional farming of target crop more economic and therefore shifts farmer plantings.
    Policy_Filibuster
    Title: "Filibuster"

    Game Text: "Play this card at the start of the voting phase to return target policy card its owner\'s hand."

    Flavor Text: "I do not like them, Sam-I-Am, I do not like green eggs and ham."
    "-Senator Ted Cruz, reading Green Eggs and Ham"

    Votes Required: Automatic
    Policy_FoodReliefCentralAsia
    Title: "Food Relief in Central Asia"

    Game Text: "This region sends 5 thousand tons of target food to Central Asia"

    Draft Affects: When drafting this policy, player selects a food to send 5 thousand tons to Central Asia.
    Policy_FoodReliefMiddleAmerica
    Title: "Food Relief in Middle America"

    Game Text: "This region sends 5 thousand tons of target food to Middle America"

    Draft Affects: When drafting this policy, player selects a food to send 5 thousand tons to Middle America.
    Policy_FoodReliefOceania
    Title: "Food Relief in Oceania"

    Game Text: "This region sends 5 thousand tons of target food to Oceania"

    Draft Affects: When drafting this policy, player selects a food to send 5 thousand tons to Oceania.
    Policy_FoodReliefSouthAsia
    Title: "Food Relief in South Asia"

    Game Text: "This region sends 5 thousand tons of target food to South Asia"

    Draft Affects: When drafting this policy, player selects a food to send 5 thousand tons to South Asia.
    Policy_FoodReliefSubSaharan
    Title: "Food Relief in Sub Saharan Africa"

    Game Text: "This region sends 5 thousand tons of target food to Sub Saharan Africa"

    Draft Affects: When drafting this policy, player selects a food to send 5 thousand tons to Central Asia.
    Policy_Fundraiser
    Title: "Fundraiser"

    Game Text: "You raise 1 million dollars"

    Flavor Text: "...A small loan of a million dollars."
    "-Donald Trump"

    Votes Required: Automatic
    Policy_InternationalFoodRelief
    Title: "International Food Relief Program"

    Game Text: "Each participating region spends X million dollars to purchase from its local farmers surplus commodity food for redistribution to where it ismost needed."

    Draft Affects: When drafting this policy, player selects an amount X to be paid by EACH player who approves the policy.
    Policy_Loan
    Title: "Loan"

    Game Text: "Target player region lends you $25 million at 10% interest for 10 years. Annual loan payments are automatically paid on December 31st of each year."

    Flavor Text: "I am not worried about the deficit. It is big enough to take care of itself."
    "-Ronald Reagan"

    Draft Affects: When drafting this policy, player selects target player from whom to attempt to borrow and the amount X.

    Votes Required: 2
    Eligible Regions: Target player only

    Model Effects: Before resolving any other model effects, 25 million dollars are transferred from target player to the card owner.
    Policy_MyPlatePromotionCampaign
    Title: "MyPlate Promotion Campaign"

    Game Text: "You spend X million dollars on an advertising campaign within your region promoting public awareness of the United States Department of Agriculture\'s MyPlate nutrition guide."

    Flavor Text: "An apple a day keeps the doctor--uh, wait, what\'s the recommended daily intake of fruit again?"

    Draft Affects: When drafting this policy, player selects X million dollars.

    Votes Required: Automatic

    Model Effects: Model uses four control points of an ease-in-out cubic Bezier function giving shift in food preference demand verses advertising dollars spent.
    Policy_Redraft
    Title: "Redraft"

    Game Text: "Return target policy card from your discard pile to your hand."

    Flavor Text: "Yeah, that was a good idea, let\'s do it again!"

    Votes Required: Automatic

    Model Effects: The fact that such cards as this exist, implies that the cards played must be kept inside of some Collection as a "Discard" pile that can be iterated over.
    Policy_ResearchInsectResistanceGrain
    Title: "Research GMO Insect Resistance for Grains"

    Game Text: "Each participating region spends X million dollars to fund GMO seed research for increasing insect resistance of a grain crop."

    Flavor Text: "Extraordinary technology at an extraordinary price."

    Draft Affects: When drafting this policy, player selects an amount X to be paid by EACH player who approves the policy.
    Policy_SearchforAnswers
    Title: "Search for Answers"

    Game Text: "Pay $50 million. Search your deck for a card and add that card to your hand. Your deck is then shuffled."

    Votes Required: Automatic

    Model Effects: The fact that such cards as this exist, implies that each region's deck must be made prior to drawing any single card, but rather at the beginning of the game.
    Policy_SharedKnowledge
    Title: "Shared Knowledge"

    Game Text: "Look at target player\'s hand. You may play one card from the revealed hand as though it is in your hand. Pay that player $10 million."

    Votes Required: Automatic

    Model Effects: The fact that such cards as this exist, implies that every player's hands must, in theory, be able to be viewed during any part of the game.
    Policy_SpecialInterests
    Title: "Special Interests"

    Game Text: "For this voting phase, the owner of this card gains $100 million that they may spend only to support policies drafted this turn."

    Votes Required: Automatic

    Model Effects: The fact that such cards as this exist, implies that there should be some way to have separate pools of money that separate available funds into what those funds may be used for.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EnumGameState Deprecated
    USE server.model.State INSTEAD Represents the various "states" that the game can be in.
    EnumPolicy
